description: Nikola Petrak, alone in his apartment and recalling the mounting chaos, chooses to activate Halden's secret failsafe after reviewing the risks of revealing BCI confessional logs. He confirms the command, knowing the system will scramble privileges and restrictions for all citizens at random.

Council members and select senior officials are alerted that the BCI has entered an unpredictable mode. Emergency sessions begin as BCI scoring, privileges, and restrictions become randomized citywide, causing confusion within institutions.

Residents throughout Stenograd wake to find their BCI statuses, access, and privileges entirely scrambled. Former elites experience sudden restrictions, while previously marginalized citizens gain unexpected freedoms. Daily routines are disrupted, sparking uncertainty and spontaneous cooperation among unlikely groups.

Forced to adapt to shifting BCI statuses, residents begin forming new alliances and holding open forums. Debates over the future of governance and justice in Stenograd surface, with many questioning whether the BCI can ever be trusted again.

After nearly three weeks of citywide upheaval and shared hardship, a vote is held: should Stenograd restore a reformed BCI, or adopt an equality-based system without algorithmic oversight? Citizens prepare to decide the city's governance future.
